con:request.name: GetTrx
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GetTrx>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:BeginDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:BringLinkedHierarchy>true</acr1:BringLinkedHierarchy>\r <acr1:ColumnDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerName xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:EndDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ExcludeResult xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ExcludeTransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ExcludeVoid>false</acr1:ExcludeVoid>\r <acr1:IncludeHeader>false</acr1:IncludeHeader>\r <acr1:IncludeImage>false</acr1:IncludeImage>\r <acr1:InvoiceId xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MerchantType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PaymentNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PaymentType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ProcessDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Processed xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber>${GetTrx}</acr1:ReferenceNumber>\r <acr1:Result xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:RowDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TransformType>XML</acr1:TransformType>\r <acr1:User xsi:nil="true"/>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GetTrx>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: GetCardTrx
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GetCardTrx>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:BeginDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:BringLinkedHierarchy>true</acr1:BringLinkedHierarchy>\r <acr1:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ColumnDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:EndDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ExcludeResult xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ExcludeTransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ExcludeVoid>false</acr1:ExcludeVoid>\r <acr1:IncludeHeader>false</acr1:IncludeHeader>\r <acr1:IncludeSignature>true</acr1:IncludeSignature>\r <acr1:InvoiceId xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MerchantType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:NameOnCard xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PaymentType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber>${GetTrx}</acr1:ReferenceNumber>\r <acr1:Result xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:RowDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Settle xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:SettleDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TransformType>XML</acr1:TransformType>\r <acr1:User xsi:nil="true"/>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GetCardTrx>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
